summary: The module provides automated test suites for the Stable Diffusion XL pipelines, including quick unit‑style checks with lightweight dummy components and full integration tests. It validates core functionality such as different sampling schedulers, text‑to‑image and image‑to‑image generation, prompt handling, model offloading, optional components, and deterministic behavior across GPU and CPU environments.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and performance of the Stable Diffusion XL generation pipelines so that downstream applications can depend on stable, high‑quality image synthesis without regressions.
